ComicInfo.Summary:
“Chasing Phantoms” Part 1! While the Turtles and Splinter are still reeling from the events of TMNT #60, they come under attack by the Street Phantoms! Will Splinter let this challenge to his rule stand?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Dave Wachter | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Carlos D'Anda | 2 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 3 | RE | Comics & Ponies Exclusive Variant Sketch Cover | None | 4 | RE | Eastman Fun Club Edition Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman | 5 | Note: The digital edition (8/17/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
